channel.title: Tweets on Adam Dingman - Cloud, DevOps, IoT

item.title: My Favorite Tweets
item.description: Focus / Deep Work This is the best definition of ‘focus’ by Jony Ive with a lesson from Steve Jobspic.twitter.com/Ye1TTldQ8w — Vala Afshar (@ValaAfshar) September 19, 2022 Ended practice early. "Why'd you end early?" We got through everything I wanted to do. The goal of practice is to improve/prepare, not to fill 2 hours of time. — Brian McCormick (@brianmccormick) January 10, 2023 Serverless I still see this a lot in the wild, so I'll reiterate: please deploy your stateless and stateful resources in separate CloudFormation stacks
